title: DEFEATER - Abandoned (Deluxe) (2015) [Melodic Hardcore]
description:
ARTIST: Defeater
ALBUM / TITLE: Abandoned (Deluxe)
RELEASE YEAR / DATE: 2015
COUNTRY: USA
STYLE: Melodic Hardcore
LABEL: Epitaph / Ada
DURATION: 00:40:24
FILE FORMAT: MP3
QUALITY: 320 kbps

TRACKLIST:

01. Contrition
02. Unanswered
03. December 1943
04. Spared in Hell
05. Divination
06. Borrowed & Blue
07. Penance
08. Remorse
09. Pillar of Salt
10. Atonement
11. Vice & Regret
12. Still & True
13. Let Me Down


Abandoned is by far the most sophisticated record Defeater has ever released. It is complex in both musical content and lyrical themes working together to reflect the overarching concept of the record as a whole. Concept records by nature are hard to create without deterring from the story or losing interest from the listeners, but Defeater rises to the occasion in order to deliver their best story yet
